column1: SCSS,Color Controlling,"Write a mixin that will have 3 properties, margin: 0 auto;, padding: 100px;, but in addition, our mixin accepts an argument ""$new-color"" that will be the value of a third property ""color"". The name of the mixin will be ""center-100-yellow"".
Then, within the below rule p, insert the mixin and give it a yellow color as the argument.
